description: Once you've cooked your roast chicken in the slow cooker you may never go back, perfectly cooked and juicy every time.
name: Slow Cooker Roast Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the lid on and cook on high for 45 minutes. Reduce the heat to low and cook for 8 hours until tender.
